A Shoulder Surfing Resistant Authentication System:

Authentication system "PassMatrix" was introduced on graphicl passwords. One-time valid login indicator, horizonatl and vertical bars were used.

Child-Safety:

An android application which acts as a smart IoT device. Itâ€™s provides parents with real-time location, surrounding weather, along with alarm buzzer to locate their child or alert bystanders in acting to rescue or comfort via SMS text enabled communication.

DSePHR:

Designed a distributed storage for encrypted Personal Health Records(PHR) day a combining the power of HBase and HDFS. PHR owner can store any health related information into PHR storage and the PHR system must ensure that the PHR owner has a full control over his/her data. PHR system provides an encryption for securing the data. The data with small size will be persisted in HBase schema and the data with large size will be persisted in HDFS.

A1_Auto_Repair:

Designed conceptual and physical database utilizing Microsoft Access.
